title: How to Purchase Shadowkeep

steps.headline: Open the PlayStation Store.
steps.description: You'll find this if you scroll all the way to the left. You can also pull this up from the bottom of your screen by pressing the PS button on your PlayStation Controller (the button between the two thumbsticks). You'll see the PlayStation Store icon all the way to the left. Log in if prompted.

steps.headline: Navigate to Search and press ×.
steps.description: You'll see this along the top of your screen.

steps.headline: Search "Destiny 2: Shadowkeep."
steps.description: Using the on-screen keyboard, type the search by navigating to the letter you want and press ×. A list of search results will appear after you enter a letter. You can navigate to one of these and press × or you can type the entire game's name.

steps.headline: Navigate to your game and press ×.
steps.description: You can either do this as soon as the game appears in search results, or you can type the entire game's name: "Destiny 2: Shadowkeep". Selecting the game will bring up the game's details page.

steps.headline: Navigate to Add to Cart and press ×.
steps.description: You'll either have the chance to continue shopping or you can continue following these steps to purchase and download Shadowkeep to your PS4.

steps.headline: Navigate to Proceed to Checkout and press ×.
steps.description: You'll then see an overview of your purchase. You'll buy the game, Shadowkeep, and a season pass for Season of Dawn.

steps.headline: Follow the on-screen instructions to make your purchase and download the game.
steps.description: You'll need to enter your payment information (if you don't have one saved for the PlayStation Store) and make sure the download information is correct (make sure you're downloading the game to the correct account and console) before continuing. Once the download is complete, you'll see a notification pop-up.

steps.headline: Open the Store.
steps.description: Tap the right bumper to navigate to the Store tab. It's the rightmost tab along the top of your screen.

steps.headline: Navigate to the search field and press A.
steps.description: You'll need to navigate down to find the search bar, which is usually next to tiles for Deals, Memberships, and Use a code.

steps.headline: Search for "Shadowkeep."
steps.description: Using the on-screen keyboard, type your search. Navigate to the letters you want to type and press A.

steps.headline: Navigate to your game and press A.
steps.description: The game's details page will open, detailing what's included in the purchase.

steps.headline: Navigate to Buy and press A.
steps.description: This is usually the first option next to "Buy as gift."

steps.headline: Follow the on-screen instructions to purchase and download Shadowkeep.
steps.description: You'll need to enter and/or confirm your payment method and then proceed to download the game. Once you confirm the payment and download the game, you'll see a progress bar in the store tile. Once it's playable, you'll get a notification.

steps.headline: Go to https://store.steampowered.com/app/1090200/Destiny_2_Shadowkeep/.
steps.description: You can use any web browser to purchase Shadowkeep from Steam.

steps.headline: Click Add to Cart under "Buy Destiny 2: "Shadowkeep" or "Buy Destiny 2: Upgrade Edition."
steps.description: You can see what each purchase includes under their titles. For example, the first "Buy Destiny 2: Shadowkeep" includes Shadowkeep and Season of Dawn for $34.99. You'll be directed to your cart that includes everything you're purchasing.

steps.headline: Click Purchase for myself.
steps.description: You'll see this green button below the itemized list of what you're buying.

steps.headline: Log in if prompted.
steps.description: If you're already logged in and not prompted here, you can skip this step. You may need to get a code in your email if you're using a browser or computer that Steam does not recognize.

steps.headline: Choose your payment method and click Continue.
steps.description: You can use the drop-down menu to select a payment method.

steps.headline: Review your payment, check the box next to "I agree…" and click Purchase.
steps.description: You'll receive an email confirmation of the purchase. Follow the on-screen instructions to download Shadowkeep.

text: Using PS4 Open the PlayStation Store. You'll find this if you scroll all the way to the left. You can also pull this up from the bottom of your screen by pressing the PS button on your PlayStation Controller (the button between the two thumbsticks). You'll see the PlayStation Store icon all the way to the left. Log in if prompted. Navigate to Search and press ×. You'll see this along the top of your screen. Search "Destiny 2: Shadowkeep." Using the on-screen keyboard, type the search by navigating to the letter you want and press ×. A list of search results will appear after you enter a letter. You can navigate to one of these and press × or you can type the entire game's name. Navigate to your game and press ×. You can either do this as soon as the game appears in search results, or you can type the entire game's name: "Destiny 2: Shadowkeep". Selecting the game will bring up the game's details page. Navigate to Add to Cart and press ×. You'll either have the chance to continue shopping or you can continue following these steps to purchase and download Shadowkeep to your PS4. Navigate to Proceed to Checkout and press ×. You'll then see an overview of your purchase. You'll buy the game, Shadowkeep, and a season pass for Season of Dawn. Follow the on-screen instructions to make your purchase and download the game. You'll need to enter your payment information (if you don't have one saved for the PlayStation Store) and make sure the download information is correct (make sure you're downloading the game to the correct account and console) before continuing. Once the download is complete, you'll see a notification pop-up. Using Xbox Open the Store. Tap the right bumper to navigate to the Store tab. It's the rightmost tab along the top of your screen. Navigate to the search field and press A. You'll need to navigate down to find the search bar, which is usually next to tiles for Deals, Memberships, and Use a code. Search for "Shadowkeep." Using the on-screen keyboard, type your search. Navigate to the letters you want to type and press A. Navigate to your game and press A. The game's details page will open, detailing what's included in the purchase. Navigate to Buy and press A. This is usually the first option next to "Buy as gift." Follow the on-screen instructions to purchase and download Shadowkeep. You'll need to enter and/or confirm your payment method and then proceed to download the game. Once you confirm the payment and download the game, you'll see a progress bar in the store tile. Once it's playable, you'll get a notification. Using Steam Go to https://store.steampowered.com/app/1090200/Destiny_2_Shadowkeep/. You can use any web browser to purchase Shadowkeep from Steam. Click Add to Cart under "Buy Destiny 2: "Shadowkeep" or "Buy Destiny 2: Upgrade Edition." You can see what each purchase includes under their titles. For example, the first "Buy Destiny 2: Shadowkeep" includes Shadowkeep and Season of Dawn for $34.99. You'll be directed to your cart that includes everything you're purchasing. Click Purchase for myself. You'll see this green button below the itemized list of what you're buying. Log in if prompted. If you're already logged in and not prompted here, you can skip this step. You may need to get a code in your email if you're using a browser or computer that Steam does not recognize. Choose your payment method and click Continue. You can use the drop-down menu to select a payment method. Review your payment, check the box next to "I agree…" and click Purchase. You'll receive an email confirmation of the purchase. Follow the on-screen instructions to download Shadowkeep.
